# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Generate XML documentation comments for public classes and members. User prefers adding or enhancing XML doc comments in code and expects the assistant to check and generate these comments。
 - 偏好：为公共类和成员生成 XML 文档注释（在代码中添加或完善 XML doc comments）。

## Code Style
- Use specific formatting rules
- Follow naming conventions

## Project-Specific Rules
- Custom requirement A
- Custom requirement B
